#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,i,two=0,three=0,five=0,j;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            j=i;
            while(j>0)
            {
                if(j%2==0)
                {
                    two++;
                    j/=2;
                }
                else if(j%3==0)
                {
                    three++;
                    j/=3;
                }
                else if(j%5==0)
                {
                    five++;
                    j/=5;
                }
                else
                break;
            }
        }
        cout<<two<<endl;
        cout<<three<<endl;
        cout<<five<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
